description: Allows the user to create and manipulate strings. The strings can be used for various purposes including cutting, controlling people like puppets, and creating protective barriers. The user can also manipulate the environment when awakened.

users.circumstances: Doflamingo ate the fruit at an unknown point in his past

abilityReveals.description: The user attaches near-invisible strings to people's spines, controlling them like marionettes and forcing them to move against their will.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Doflamingo uses Parasite to control the G-5 Marines, forcing them to attack each other while he searches for Law.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Strings are incredibly sharp and can cut through nearly anything
strengths.description: The strings produced by this fruit are razor-sharp and extremely durable.
User can attach strings to multiple targets and control them all at once like puppets.
